Stumbled across this upon another forum. Sheer brilliance!

That's pretty funny. Here's another one, but I'm sure people have seen this one before: http://www.bringyou.to/apologetics/p67.htm
 
 Can you imagine if Bible's had to be sold with the following label on them:
 
 "This book contains material on God. God is a theory, not a fact, regarding the creation of the universe, the objective nature of ethics, and the source of all life. This material should be approached with an open mind, studied carefully, and critically considered."

Hey I live in Cobb County and you know we can't handle the truth here. Seriously though I belong to the Atlanta Freethough Society precisely because there is so much ignorance and stupidity here. And I am not being mean, ignorance is not knowing better, stupidity is either being too lazy or too obstinant to bother learning the truth.

Can you imagine if Bible's had to be sold with the following label on them:
 
 "This book contains material on God. God is a theory, not a fact, regarding the creation of the universe, the objective nature of ethics, and the source of all life. This material should be approached with an open mind, studied carefully, and critically considered."

 
 emoticon_xgood Hehehehehehe. That made me laugh, but you actually make a good point. They should have I AM JUST A THEORY written on them, otherwise kids will regard them as fact and then where will we be?
I totally dig it. That is great!
